text: 4:45 Jon 2:23Galilin Distrighɨn itir gumazamiziba, me uaghan Israel bagh Itazir Dughiamɨn Isam bagha Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn ghue, ezɨ Iesus dughiar kamɨn mirakelɨn avɨribagh amizɨma me dar gani. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Iesus datɨrɨghɨn uamategha ghua Galilin Distrighɨn otozɨ, Galilin gumazamiziba bar akuegha a ini.
